metadata.title: CVE-2020-13240 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The DMS/ECM module in Dolibarr 11.0.4 allows users with the 'Setupdocuments directories' permission to rename uploaded files to have insecurefile extensions. This bypasses the .noexe protection mechanism against XSS.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
